title: Gmail’s new “integrated view” goes live for Workspace users next week
content:
Last year Google gave us a sneak peek at a new layout for Gmail that combined Gmail, Chat, Meet, and Spaces in one space. Google has now shared when this new redesign would be available for users. In a recent post over at Google Workspace Updates, Google announced the rollout plan of Gmail’s new integrated

The post Gmail’s new “integrated view” goes live for Workspace users next week appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google Workspace users will be able to try out Gmail's new integrated view starting February 8. Here's what you need to know.
